```py
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({"student_id": [1, 2, 3], "grade": ["A", "C", "D"]})
```

```py
grades = df["grade"]
grades.iloc[0] = "E"
df

   student_id grade
0           1     E
1           2     C
2           3     D
```

```py
df[df["student_id"] > 2]["grades"] = "F"
df

   student_id grade
0           1     A
1           2     C
2           3     D
```

```py
import weakref

class Dummy:
    def __init__(self, a):
        self.a = a

In[1]: obj = Dummy(1)
In[2]: ref = weakref.ref(obj)
In[3]: ref()
Out[3]: <__main__.Dummy object at 0x108187d60>
In[4]: obj = Dummy(2)
```
